other_title: Futsuu no Joshikousei ga [Local Idol] Yattemita.
普通の女子校生が【ろこどる】やってみた。
opening_theme: "Mirai Fanfare (ミライファンファーレ)" by Nagarekawa Girls [Nanako Usami (Miku Itou), Yukari Kohinata (Sachika Misawa)]
ending_theme: #1: "Mirai Shoujo-tachi (未来少女たち)" by Nagarekawa Girls [Nanako Usami (Miku Itou), Yukari Kohinata (Sachika Misawa)] (eps 1-2)
#2: "Mirai Shoujo-tachi (未来少女たち)" by Nanako Usami (Miku Itou), Yukari Kohinata (Sachika Misawa), Yui Mikoze (Maya Yoshioka) (eps 3-6)
#3: "Mirai Shoujo-tachi (未来少女たち)" by Nanako Usami (Miku Itou), Yukari Kohinata (Sachika Misawa), Yui Mikoze (Maya Yoshioka), Mirai Nazukari (Inori Minase) (eps 7-12)
